content.en: Homomorphic encryption: Researchers are exploring the use of algorithms in cryptography to develop new encryption schemes that can protect sensitive data in various applications, such as cloud computing and healthcare. These algorithms enable computations to be performed on encrypted data without the need for decryption, ensuring the privacy and confidentiality of the information. Additionally, they are proposing novel and efficient homomorphic encryption schemes that can resist attacks and provide secure data protection.
content.da: Homomorfisk kryptering: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer inden for kryptografi for at udvikle nye krypteringsmetoder, der kan beskytte følsomme data i forskellige applikationer, såsom cloud computing og sundhedspleje. Disse algoritmer muliggør beregninger på krypterede data uden behov for dekryptering og sikrer dermed informationens privatliv og fortrolighed. Derudover foreslår de nye og effektive homomorfiske krypteringsmetoder, der kan modstå angreb og give sikker databeskyttelse.
